Controllers Archetype Module¶

Proteus - Archetype Controller

class proteus.controllers.archetype.ArchetypeController(*args, **kwargs)¶

Class that implements the Template Method Pattern which calls the Archetype Manager, passing the Custom Folder and if there is any error then the normal archetype folder is passed instead as parameter.

_get_archetypes(loader_func) → dict¶

Get the archetypes using the loader function passed as parameter and if there is any error in the custom archetype folder, then the normal archetype folder is passed instead as parameter.

_load_document_archetypes(folder) → dict¶

Private method to load the document archetypes.

_load_object_archetypes(folder) → dict¶

Private method to load the object archetypes.

_load_project_archetypes(folder) → dict¶

Private method to load the project archetypes.

get_document_archetypes() → dict¶

Get the document archetypes.

get_object_archetypes() → dict¶

Get the object archetypes.

get_project_archetypes() → dict¶

Get the project archetypes.
